description: This file is an Alembic migration script that defines the initial database schema for a music streaming service, including tables for users, tracks, playlists, playlist tracks, recommendation events, and stream sessions.

methods.name: upgrade
methods.description: Defines the schema changes to upgrade the database to this revision, creating tables and indexes for users, tracks, playlists, playlist_tracks, recommendation_events, and stream_sessions.

methods.name: downgrade
methods.description: Reverts the schema changes made in upgrade by dropping the created tables and indexes.
